Photo / NZME
Radio host attempted murder: Trio sentenced for plot to kill Auckland-based international celebrity Harnek Singh https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/radio-host-attempted-murder-trio-sentenced-for-plot-to-kill-auckland-based-international-celebrity-harnek-singh/NNNYR5IMPFGB5O7W2KTN6K7MY4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/radio-host-attempted-murder-trio-sentenced-for-plot-to-kill-auckland-based-international-celebrity-harnek-singh/NNNYR5IMPFGB5O7W2KTN6K7MY4/ Craig KapitanTwo of the men were found guilty by a jury in October. Another pleaded guilty. Tue, 28 Nov 2023 00:47:12 +0000 A man with name suppression faced trial in the High Court at Auckland, accused of orchestrating the attempted murder of radio host Harnek Singh. Photo / Jason Oxenham

Strong winds force cruise ship to skip Wellington visit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/strong-winds-force-cruise-ship-to-skip-wellington-visit/64G47SAEPVDXZPI43OR7R3NMZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/strong-winds-force-cruise-ship-to-skip-wellington-visit/64G47SAEPVDXZPI43OR7R3NMZM/ The Ovation of the Seas has turned around from Wellington because of the wind. Mon, 27 Nov 2023 23:15:07 +0000 The ship's captain decided they were not prepared to stay in the capital due to strong winds.
Auckland Transport causes ire for Aucklanders with Meola Road summer closure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-causes-ire-for-aucklanders-with-meola-road-summer-closure/3M2FV5BVTZBFPNJAL3RZYHWWDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-causes-ire-for-aucklanders-with-meola-road-summer-closure/3M2FV5BVTZBFPNJAL3RZYHWWDY/ Katie FitzgeraldMeola Road will be closed from mid-December until early February.Mon, 27 Nov 2023 23:05:13 +0000 Meola Road will be closed for roadworks over the summer.
